comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: This is part of a batch of a 1914 Rutgers / Washington-Jefferson game at the Polo Grounds. Looks like correct spelling of this player is Spiegel. Halfback Johnny Spiegel: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Johnny_Spiegel query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=FB0E12F63C5C13...

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: artolog:  Thanks for correcting the information on Spiegel.  We'll fix the record next time we update.
